recipes.name: Hummus
recipes.description: A creamy and delicious hummus recipe.
instructions: Drain and rinse the chickpeas.
In a food processor, combine the chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, garlic, and salt. Blend until smooth and creamy.
Add a tablespoon of water at a time until desired consistency is reached.
Serve with pita bread and vegetables for dipping.

recipes.name: Baklava
recipes.description: A sweet and crispy Turkish dessert.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
In a food processor, chop the walnuts into small pieces.
Mix the chopped walnuts with sugar in a bowl.
Place a layer of phyllo dough in a baking dish and brush with melted butter.
Repeat until you have 7 layers.
Spread the walnut mixture over the phyllo dough.
Add another 7 layers of phyllo dough, brushing each layer with melted butter.
Using a sharp knife, cut the baklava into diamond shapes.
Bake for 45 minutes or until golden brown.
In a saucepan, mix honey and water and bring to a boil.
Pour the hot syrup over the baklava.
Let the baklava cool before serving.

recipes.name: Grilled Salmon
recipes.description: A simple and tasty grilled salmon recipe.
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
In a small bowl, mix together olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, salt, and pepper.
Brush the mixture onto both sides of the salmon fillets.
Place the salmon on the grill, skin side down.
Grill for 5-6 minutes on each side or until the salmon is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
Serve with a side of vegetables or salad.

recipes.name: Falafel Wrap
recipes.description: A flavorful and satisfying street food option.
instructions: Heat the falafel in the oven or microwave according to package instructions.
Warm the tortilla in the microwave or on a griddle.
Add lettuce, tomato, and falafel to the tortilla.
Wrap the tortilla around the filling and enjoy!

recipes.name: Tabbouleh
instructions: In a large bowl, soak the bulgur wheat in cold water for 30 minutes.
Drain the bulgur wheat and squeeze out any excess water.
Chop the parsley, tomatoes, and onion and add to the bowl with the bulgur wheat.
Finely chop the mint and add to the bowl.
In a separate small bowl, whisk together the lemon juice and olive oil.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
Chill in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes before serving.

recipes.name: Shrimp Scampi
recipes.description: A classic Italian seafood pasta dish.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat.
Add the garlic and cook for 1-2 minutes or until fragrant.
Add the shrimp and cook for 2-3 minutes on each side or until pink and cooked through.
Add the lemon juice and white wine and bring to a simmer.
Simmer for 2-3 minutes or until the sauce has thickened slightly.
Add the cooked spaghetti and parsley to the skillet and toss to combine.
Serve hot with grated Parmesan cheese, if desired.
